testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables
testcase.name: Search for items and validate the results
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenKart Landing page.....................................passed When User search for "Cucumber" Vegetable...................................passed Then "Cucumber" results are displayed.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables
testcase.name: Search for items and then move to checkout page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenKart Landing page.....................................passed When User search for Cucumber Vegetables....................................passed Then Cucumber Fruit results are displayed...................................passed And Add items to cart.......................................................passed And User proceeded to Checkout page for purchase............................passed Then Verify selected Cucumber items are displayed in Check out page.........passed

testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables
